title: FEC to Hold Open Meeting on July 20, 2006
html:
HOME / PRESS OFFICE

Federal Election Commission

July 18, 2006

ATTENTION WIRE SERVICES, DAYBOOK EDITORS:
FEC OPEN MEETING THURSDAY JULY 20

On Thursday, July 20, the Federal Election Commission will meet in Open Session to consider the adoption of one Advisory Opinion.  This Advisory Opinion responds to a request from Unity ’08 that asks whether the organization, which is planning to identify, promote, and finance an independent candidacy for President and Vice President in 2008, would be required to register with the FEC, file disclosure reports as a political committee, and abide by the contribution limits limits and source prohibitions applicable to political committees.

The draft advisory opinion to be considered at the meeting can be found here.

Meetings are held at 10 a.m. in the 9th floor hearing room at the Commission’s offices at 999 E Street N.W. in Washington.
